name: Home Solo Car Racer
description:
It's a small toy car home racing game with 39 indoor levels.
You are alone in the game. it's a single player game. But with the option to save multiple user profiles.
The ambiance in the game is calm and relaxing, with a modern indoor architecture style.
As the name indicates you should play the levels many times to get better record times.
It's a 39 level racing game to find the checkpoints and do the needed laps to the finish line.
